I just finished watching Mark Cuban’s 60 minutes docuseries, “OBJECTified”... where he talked about "rules for success" --- there are three of them.
MY FAVORITE (and one of which I agree with wholeheartedly): the one thing you control in life is EFFORT.
The other two... NO SHORTCUTS. Defining success: waking up in the morning with a smile on your face.
Don’t shortcut yourself. Give it all you’ve got, everyday!

Sole Recruiter specializing in full cycle recruiting for all level positions within departments: Origination, Processing, Underwriting, Closing, Post Closing/Secondary, Servicing, HR, Accounting and IT. Develop relationships with Hiring Managers and Executive Leadership to identify hiring needs. Implementation of a new ATS & paperless on-boarding. Leveraging iSolved, LinkedIn Recruiter, Glassdoor, Indeed & ZipRecruiter. Create/post job descriptions. Review applications and screen applicants to obtain work history, education, job skills, salary requirements alongside providing information about Cascade and the position being discussed. Sit-in on in-person interviews.Administrative duties such as weekly reports, entering & managing job requisitions within iSolved, setting up phone screens & interviews, obtaining references, writing/presenting offers, kicking-off/following-up with on-boarding paperwork as well as background/credit screenings.

Specialized in full cycle sales in territories both nationwide and worldwide. Developed relationships with Small Business Owners & helped them succeed through implementation of Infusionsoft software. Administrative duties such as updating spreadsheets within Excel, entering & managing accounts within SalesForce.

Specialized in full cycle recruiting for all level positions in Inside Sales, Sales Operations, Finance and Accounting nationwide. Developed relationships with 60+ Hiring Managers and Executive Leaders to identify hiring needs. Networked by attending career fairs and leveraging SuccessFactors, LinkedIn Recruiter, Indeed, Monster & Glassdoor. Reviewed applications and screen applicants to obtain work history, education, job skills, salary requirements alongside providing information about Insight and the position being discussed. Administrative duties such as updating spreadsheets within Excel, entering & managing job requisitions within SuccessFactors, conducting behavioral assessments, setting up interviews, obtaining references, writing/presenting offers, kicking-off/following-up with onboarding paperwork as well as drug/background screenings.

August 19, 2015, Roy worked with Erin in different groups

First and foremost, Erin is a smart, well spoken, and a friendly person. She was my first point of contact at Insight and stayed diligent with me, keeping me informed every step of the way. Erin not only made sure that I was up to date, but kept me on my toes with making sure that I was doing my part. I had a big decision to make from switching career paths and she made me feel more than comfortable with making this big change. On day one of training she is the person you would expect to see on the other side of the line, bright and full of positivity. If you ever have the pleasure with speaking with her, I’m sure you will agree. My recommendation of Erin Sebastian comes with knowing that she is more than capable, experienced, and well suited for any role. If you are interested in speaking with someone who is confident and genuine, Erin is your woman.Sincerely,Roy Rodriguez
